comments: Author used the spelling  Zämels until 1927 and the spelling Zämelis from 1928 onwards.
examples: Pulsatilla patens subsp. hirsutissima Zämelis in Acta Horti Bot. Univ. Latv. 1: 101. (1926), as 'Zämels'. Philadelphus viksnei Zämelis in Acta Hort. Bot. Univ. Latv. 11-12: 232 (1939), as Zämelis.
